name: Wanted (fabioecco)
description:
You are the most wanted criminal of the galaxy with a high bounty on your head. Destroy ships, asteroids and whole planets in a procedurally generated galaxy. Steal your foe's ships. Each time you play, there's different objectives. There's no map and there's permadeath.

This game was made for "One Game a Month" jam (within 2 weeks) and probably there will be bugs and other issues. Have fun!
